Detailed Description

Manages a single question in a poll.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Question::Question (  &$  db,
$  id = null,
$  pollID = null
) 
 

Constructor

Parameters:
$db a reference to a PEAR::DB object
$id the if of the question
$pollID the id of the poll to associate this question
If the construction fails Question::isError() will return an Error object.

Returns:
